# Council Position 3

## Councilor E'an Todd

The Fairview City Council appointed E'an to serve the remainder of the term for Council Position 3 in November 2023. E'an was subsequently elected to Council Position 3 in November 2024 general election. Councilor Todd's current term ends December 31, 2028.

Prior to his appointment on Council, E'an served on the Fairview Planning Commission and Economic Development Advisory Committee.

### City of Fairview Boards &amp; Commissions

- [Economic Development Advisory Committee](https://www.fairvieworegon.gov/366/Economic-Development-Advisory-Committee) - Council Liaison

### Regional Boards &amp; Commissions

- [East Multnomah County Transportation Commission](https://www.multco.us/transportation-planning/east-multnomah-county-transportation-committee) - Fairview Representative

![E'an Todd (JPG)](https://www.fairvieworegon.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=5532 "E'an Todd (JPG)")
